A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie takes real world politics too far\, and fans dont need to be divided by political rubbish\, Star Wars brought people together it never divided them regardless of their political views. This movie has done a massive disservice to fans old and new. Kathleen Kenedy please do everyone a favor and step down clearly you cannot stay as the head of Lucas Film. Please let Star Wars be what it once was. Amazing and let people come together politics aside. Please step down immediately. And Hire capable humans.
